headline: CNN Special Reports
subHeadline: All The Best, All The Worst 2024; Donald Trump Won the 2024 Election; Women Dominates Music Industry; Mass Shootings Became a Norm; U.S. Athletes Won More Gold in 2024. Aired 11p-12a ET

utterances.speaker: TOM FOREMAN, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Hold on tight. 2024 was a crazy, reckless, risky ride with surprises at every turn, where every rough road led to another. And we're taking a look back at that long, strange trip with our panelists. Roy Wood Jr., Brianna Keilar, Boris Sanchez, Kyung Lah, Omar Jimenez, Pamela Brown, and John Berman.It's All the Best, All the Worst 2024 Coast to Coast. Welcome, I'm Tom Foreman. And while every year is a unique journey, the past 12 months took us on an epically bumpy ride through big news entertainment, sports, music, pop culture, and of course, where we begin on the roughest road of all. The biggest, best, worst political story of the year was the titanic fight for the White House between sitting President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump. (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP) BRIANNA KEILAR, CO-ANCHOR, CNN: Unbelievable. ROY WOOD JR., COMEDIAN: This year was the year of battle.

utterances.speaker: PAMELA BROWN, CNN SENIOR WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: Both sides felt like the other side represented the end of America, right?DONALD TRUMP, PRESIDENT-ELECT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA: He's done a poor job.

utterances.speaker: JOE BIDEN, PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
utterances.sentences: What were you talking about?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst reality. Even as bitter words flew between the oldest presidential candidates ever, polls showed most voters didn't like either choice.

utterances.speaker: JOHN BERMAN, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: It was the election that nobody asked for, and everyone was getting. And they were getting it every day at full volume.

utterances.speaker: KYUNG LAH, CNN SENIOR INVESTIGATIVE CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: If this were a dating show, you'd want to walk off the set.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The twice impeached Trump rode in on an avalanche of legal cases over classified documents, election meddling, sexual misconduct, ordered to pay hundreds of millions for his misdeeds, and still stewing about his election loss in 2020.

utterances.speaker: OMAR JIMENEZ, CNN CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: A lot happened fast and I can't even remember how things have happened.

utterances.speaker: JAKE TAPPER, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Former President Donald J. Trump convicted of 34 felony charges.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst legal moment for the former president, being convicted for dozens of felony counts tied to a hush money payments to a porn star.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: As far as the trial itself, it was very unfair.WOOD JR.: Donald Trump is the first president I've ever seen who do the scandals then get elected. You did it wrong. You're supposed to get elected. Then you run the scams.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the GOP barely blinked. Trump blew through the field of would-be challengers and secured his party's nomination with ease.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Yes, the Republicans had every chance to change their course from Trump politics, and they didn't.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Biden had his own problems. Concern about his age, immigration, and inflation fatigue.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: I'm from Kentucky, and I was talking to a lot of people from home who maybe didn't love Donald Trump, but they weren't happy about the prices at the grocery store.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: The bottom line, the headwinds that Joe Biden was facing were just huge.

utterances.speaker: TAPPER
utterances.sentences: We're live from Georgia, a key battleground state in the race for the White House.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Then came the worst debate for Democrats. While Trump rolled out a torrent of falsehoods, Biden sputtered, muttered.

utterances.speaker: BIDEN
utterances.sentences: Look, if we finally beat Medicare?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And teed up the best line of the evening for his opponent.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I really don't know what he said at the end of that sentence. I don't think he knows what he said either.

utterances.speaker: BORIS SANCHEZ, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: My jaw dropped to the ground. And you knew right then that the shape of this race was going to change.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: Take a look at what happened. FOREMANTrump's life in Pennsylvania, which left one person dead, two critically injured, and the candidate bloodied. The tragedy set up a triumphant Republican National Convention.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I said, Trump mania from wild brother. Let Trump mania rule again. Let Trump mania make America, great again!

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Under intense pressure amid bad polling, Biden dropped out.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: If someone had written that into a script, we as political journalists would say that's not how it works.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Just like that, Vice President Kamala Harris was the new Democratic nominee and her party's best chance for a do-over.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: So, there was this swell of excitement from pop culture. You know, Kamala is brat, right?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: As Trump stumbled.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I didn't know she was black until a number of years ago when she happened to turn black.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Harris rode rising polls, anger over abortion restrictions, and she racked up big-name supporters eager to trump on Trump.

utterances.speaker: MICHELLE OBAMA, FORMER FIRST LADY OF THE UNITED STATES
utterances.sentences: Who's going to tell him that the job he's currently seeking might just be one of those black jobs?(APPLAUSE) WOOD JR.: Kamala definitely had a lot of momentum. She had the money. She had the popularity.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Look, it was clear at the beginning that Donald Trump did not know how to run against Vice President Harris.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In the second presidential debate, V.P. Harris lured Trump into the worst lie about immigrants.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: They're eating the cats. They're eating -- they're eating the pets of the people that live there.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It's something that such trope that has been repeated so often in history about people of color that it was astonishing to hear it come out of his mouth.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I will appoint a real special prosecutor.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But Trump came storming back, flooding the campaign with fear and falsehoods while promising pardons for many January 6th rioters.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: That was a day of love.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Slipping past what officials say was a second assassination attempt, although the accused man denies it, and raging at anyone who backed Harris.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Kamala is for they, them. President Trump is for you.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Harris fought to the wire.

utterances.speaker: KAMALA HARRIS, VICE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
utterances.sentences: It doesn't have to be this way.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: But it was a tall order to pull off a campaign in that amount of time.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: So, when you got to election night, really no one knew what was going to happen.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It is now official CNN projects that Donald Trump has been elected president defeating Vice President Kamala Harris.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It didn't take long to find out.(CROWD CHANTING)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Four years after losing the presidency, Trump reclaimed it, a feat not seen since Grover Cleveland in 1892.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: There is something about him that speaks to America, and we have to understand that.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Republicans romped, taking the Senate, holding the House, while critics howled about a conservative plan they thought might trash government as we know it.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: And yet there were so many people out there that felt like that very structure, that very system, those very institutions had failed them.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: And I think that's a big reason why Donald Trump won.

utterances.speaker: HARRIS
utterances.sentences: While I concede this election, I do not concede the fight.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Democrats did the best thing they could, pledging themselves to a peaceful transfer of power. Even as the election crushed hopes, the legal system might hold Trump accountable.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: Many of them still feel this way, that Donald Trump back in the White House represents the end of democracy.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The wildest promotion.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: I'm proud to endorse and encourage you to get this Bible.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Trump's selling merch throughout the campaign and beyond.WOOD JR.: If you'd have told me 15 years ago that Donald Trump would be the president and he would be selling gold sneakers to black people, I would have just called you crazy.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: After his win, Trump began rolling out a raft of controversial cabinet picks and advisors, many who have echoed his calls to go after his critics.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: He went for loyalists. He went for people who would break things.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: There should be no surprise.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Trump's promise throughout his campaign and especially towards the end was one of retribution and revenge.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Of course, with some of his picks immediately running into troubles, it's hardly a done deal.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: We haven't even gotten to the confirmation process where all eyes are on these candidates.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: What's more, when the popular vote was fully counted, it showed Trump won. But he fell short of 50 percent and had one of the smallest winning margins in a half century.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: That's going to bother him.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It's a clear victory. But stop using the word landslide.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Still, some Republican lawmakers are eager to do whatever the next president wants.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: If Donald Trump says jump three feet high and scratch your head, we all jump three feet high and scratch our heads.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Even as the opposition races to keep pushing back hard.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We will push back against far-right extremism whenever necessary.(END VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Sit tight, we have so much more ahead, including the best movies and music, the perils of unlimited shrimp, and heads up!

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: It's launching!

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: Is that that's a good thing I take it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Chappell Roan was smoking at the Video Music Awards, Ariana Grande kept cool, and Billie Eilish took flight again.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Look, the pop women this year, I feel like really brought it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Sabrina Carpenter not only had hits, but also gets our award for the best tour for an artist not named Taylor Swift.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: She really blew up this year. I really, really like her. My daughter loves her, but enough with the espresso.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In rap, Kendrick Lamar gave the best beat down to his old rival Drake.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It's a diss track and it's a vicious one at that. And yet it has this amazing beat that you can dance to.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And he rolled out a surprise new album to the delight of fans.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: It's unbelievable.

utterances.speaker: WOOD
utterances.sentences: I don't know if anyone had a better year musically than Kendrick Lamar.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It was a big year for country with hot hits from Shaboozey, Post Malone.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: Post Malone was everywhere this year. Post Malone is actually one of the artists that I listen to a lot.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Dasha too.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: I do not like country music. Can you believe that?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the biggest, boldest, best move on the country charts came from pop star Beyonce with Cowboy Carter.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It's all sort of wildly popular country, and hip hop, and pop, and rock. They all blend in certain ways now that maybe they didn't 20, 30 years ago.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In the Latin music scene, an old favorite Juan Luis Guerra grabbed the Grammy for best album. For indie pop we liked Illuminati Hotties, Dead, Fontaines D.C., but we're calling Bleacher's the best.There was just so much good music this year. The worst job is picking favorites, but make no mistake, the person on top of the pop throne it's still Taylor Swift. Breaking records, grabbing awards, making fans swoon over her romantic adventures.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It was so much fun to watch this budding romance, you know. I mean, who would have ever even heard of Like the NFL until Taylor Swift came along?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And proving once again, it's good to be the queen.Let's turn now from gold records to the silver screen. Out in Hollywood, superhero flicks have dominated the box office for quite some time, but this year, the movies went in a cartoonish direction. (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Look, we all have a job to do. I plan for the future.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You want to sit with us?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: These girls are so cool.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Inside Out 2" made more than $1 billion in less than three weeks.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Hey.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The fastest any animated movie has ever hit that milestone.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: When I was a kid, where were the movies teaching us about our feelings?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And the list of top money makers was crowded with more of the same. The minions reappeared in "Despicable Me 4."

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We need volunteers. Nice work, gentlemen.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You were chosen to become something more than you already are.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Kung Fu Panda" showed off his moves again.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: I'm done with the "Kung Fu Panda's." Like, stop. Stop already.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is a call from the ancestors. To sail to new skies.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And "Moana 2" rode the wave of animation fascination. The worst problem for many these days, movies cost a lot and not everyone loves fans singing along.WOOD JR.: The same karaoke, the same concert. Shut your ass up.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I don't know why you are so greedy for it in this one.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Big budget spectacles had their moments, including the long- awaited "Gladiator 2."

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: "Gladiator 2," I can't wait to see and I'm going to make it work because "Gladiator 1" is my favorite movie of all time.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is a form of power that our world has not yet seen. The ultimate power.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best visuals with breathtaking scenes and out of this world action, the winner has to be "Dune, Part 2."

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: That's what you want. That's what you want. And for me, that is what defined my movie experience.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Deadpool and Wolverine" managed to keep superheroes in the mix.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I have no idea how to save it alone. But you, you know how to save it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Spoiler alert.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It turned out it was fairly violent.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In straight drama, the worst anxiety came from Civil War.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: There's some kind of misunderstanding here.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: What?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You're American.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It also had the best line of the year.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Okay. What kind of American are you?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: That is really a Rorschach test for where you sit politically. What you see in it tells you more about yourself than the actual movie.WOOD JR.: The last time those two met up, it was almost the end of Kong.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Of course, "Godzilla and Kong" raged again and --

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Sometimes the old ways are better than the new.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The bigger, better, faster sequel to the "Twister" franchise sucked in a huge audience.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: I thought the plot was very good. I thought the special effects were excellent. I thought the soundtrack was very good. If I'm being honest with you though, I think Glen Powell is a hottie.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Come on, Mike, slow down!

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We are late.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The worst trend, if you haven't already noticed. The continuing dominance of sequels. Although, admittedly, follow-up films such as "Bad Boys," "Ride or Die," were huge hits.WOOD JR.: Love or hate, Will Smith for what happened, that boy still got it on screen.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Who is this Santa? He's scaring my kid.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Yes. He's scaring me too.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In horror, all the good little kids went to see "Terrifier 3." All the Oscar watchers grabbed onto the substance.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: There's been a slight misuse of the substance.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In comedy, give a hand to "The Fall Guy."

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You're a stuntman. Nobody's going to notice you. That's your job. No offense.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I mean, sun taking.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And "Beetlejuice Beetlejuice" conjured up giggles too.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Feel free to express yourselves. Don't be afraid.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You're a figment of my imagination.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Really?

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Michael Keaton is a genius, and I enjoyed watching it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best Magical Moments, "Wicked" is the winner.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You have no real power.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: That's why I need you.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Don't let her get away this wicked witch.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And even with several movies making late Oscar bids, we've already picked a strong contender for best film.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is a conclave, Aldo. It's not a war.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: It is a war. And you have to commit to a sign.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Conclave" is a modern masterpiece and a hit with papal people everywhere.(END VIDEO CLIP) FOREMAN: The world of big news seemed almost cinematic this year, full of such drama and explosive events, so when we come back, we will take a look. Plus, we'll have the best moments in sports, the cutest lost penguin. (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Pretty, pretty cute.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Beyond the election, this was a year jammed with huge news stories which in any other time could have dominated the headlines for weeks. For raw intensity and surprise impact, nothing topped the worst storm of the year. Hurricane Helene striking the southern coast, then moving up and hammering North Carolina.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: So much water, so much water in places that just couldn't handle it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In the middle of the country, tornadoes slammed one community after another.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Look, this was a chaotic year.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: As NASA called this summer the hottest on record. Heat waves hit and hit and held on.WOOD JR.: Maybe it shouldn't be 80 full in December.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: This is an emergency evacuation.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Out West, it was not the worst fire season, but --

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: In California there are so many wildfires that we can't cover them all.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: So this is the kitchen, was.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It's yet another sign that climate change is real and that its impacts are being felt more and more each day.

utterances.speaker: CROWD
utterances.sentences: Two. One.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: More than 200 orbital rockets blasted off this year, bringing us, among other things, the first civilian spacewalk.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: The most interesting thing was the propulsion system just coming back and sort of parking itself.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: We also got the worst flight delay. Those two astronauts who took the new Boeing Starliner to the space station for a week and had been stuck there for months.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It's like Gilligan's Island on the International Space Station. You go for a three-hour tour and you're up there for like a year and a half.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: That was just part of the worst turbulence for Boeing, which saw a door plug blowout in flight, massive legal payouts, and a labor dispute as well.WOOD JR.: If it's anybody that need to pay their mechanics, it's Boeing.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst unexpected accident, the bridge that was hit by a ship in Baltimore and collapsed, killing six people. Overall, the American economy was among the best in the world. The stock market hit new highs, consumer spending and hiring remained strong, but public opinion.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: I don't think most people understand what's going on with the economy, but what they do understand is their ability to put food on their table.WOOD JR.: I think people feel about the economy however they feel about their own home.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best cashing in on it. The computer chip and software giant Nvidia edged past Microsoft and Apple this fall to become the most valuable publicly traded company on earth, each worth more than $3 trillion.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: It's insane. Don't you wish you got in there early on.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Other companies had the worst time. Jo-Ann stores unraveled into bankruptcy. So did Tupperware, the 99 Cents only stores. Kmart closed its last major outlet.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: In the course of a month in the 80s, when I was little, we would hit all of those spots. Well, we wouldn't hit Tupperware, but we'd use it.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: I mean, brick and mortar. These stores are having hard times right now.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Flavor drop.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: Red Lobster is on the comeback trail.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And in the worst shell game, those endless shrimp allegedly helped sink one of America's favorite seafood joints. But Fresh Financing has Red Lobster regrouping.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: So, I, for one, am bullish on Red Lobster. I'm buying Red Lobster all the way. Cheddar Bay biscuits, baby.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst public image plunge. The U.S. Supreme Court, dominated by conservatives, issued rulings that gave presidents broad immunity from prosecution, limited the regulatory power of government, and saw critics sharply question the impartiality of some justices.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It does lend to the argument the Supreme Court has indeed been politicized and that the opinions of the justices are not based on law and precedent.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The court's ruling more than two years ago to let states decide on abortion rights is still white hot.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: I don't think that like this is over by any stretch of the imagination and it's still a galvanizing topic.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And conservative groups this year pursued even more hard right policies on religion in the public square.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: We're seeing people on the right pushing the envelope because even though things have been asked and answered, they think maybe with this court the answer has changed.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The worst court time goes to Sean Diddy Combs, who is facing a storm of criminal and civil cases tied to people who say he drugged and sexually abused them. Diddy denies the accusations, but could face many years behind bars, and he's already facing outrage over video showing him violently assaulting a former girlfriend in 2016.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: Astonishing. It turned everything upside down for Diddy. And that is the power of video.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Cryptocurrency king Sam Bankman-Fried was sentenced to 25 years for fraud.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: Do not ask me a question about cryptocurrency, please. Let me read up on it, then I'll get back to you.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Mass shootings continued to rock communities coast to coast. While in New York, the gunning down of United Healthcare CEO Brian Thompson spurred a manhunt, and in Georgia.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The killing of a single young woman out for a run rattled a national debate about immigration.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: The murder of Laken Riley by an undocumented immigrant became a symbolic case for so many people who said, there are those who are being killed by people who shouldn't be in the country.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best news for many families facing the tragedy of addiction. Overall deaths are declining.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Anybody who studies that field, anybody who's dealt with that first hand, wants those numbers to go down much further than they are already.Overseas, a late year charge by rebels overturned the 50-year reign of the family of Bashar al-Assad. The brutal dictator was sent on the run to Russia. Next door, running clashes between Israel, Palestinian groups, Hezbollah and Iran threatened to boil over even as ceasefires were negotiated. In Haiti, violence ran rampant.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It just seems like every iteration of news that comes out of Haiti is more and more depressing.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The occupation of eastern Ukraine by Russia passed day 1000.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It is a very, very tenuous situation at best. And it's hard to imagine things staying like they are now in Ukraine for the next year.

utterances.speaker: TUCKER CARLSON, HOST, FOX NEWS
utterances.sentences: Pardon my English. What is denazification?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Not helping, right-wing ideologue Tucker Carlson sitting down for the worst interview with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: My god, did you watch that whole thing? It just felt like a talk show, like propaganda.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It all fed dismal polls of how people feel about the state of things.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: That should give you an indication of people's perception of what this world is.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the best news in the whole mess, former U.S. President Jimmy Carter turned 100, becoming the oldest U.S. president ever.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In a moment we will lace up our cleats and hit the field for the very best and worst in sports, including breakdancing at the Olympics.(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: So what are you planning?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Watch it all burn.(END VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You know what the problem with the U.S. culture show, they're so damn interesting.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: On television, among the hot new arrivals was Tracker, which chased down one of the biggest weekly audiences. And not far behind, Kathy Bates was mesmerizing as the new Matlock.

utterances.speaker: KATHY BATES, ACTRESS
utterances.sentences: There's this funny thing that happens when women age. We become damn near invisible. Oh, dear.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I got you.

utterances.speaker: BATES
utterances.sentences: That's how I got through your security.

utterances.speaker: CARRIE PRESTON, ACTRESS
utterances.sentences: Wow, what is all this?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Carrie Preston barged in too.

utterances.speaker: PRESTON
utterances.sentences: Hi, I'm Elsbeth Tascioni. I'm the thingy-thing.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: The thingy-thing?

utterances.speaker: PRESTON
utterances.sentences: The outside observer.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Those were all big winners for the big broadcast networks. Throw in another hot year for "Chicago Fire. Med and PD," "Blue Bloods," "FBI" and more, and it proves police and emergency procedurals are still big draws for American audiences.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: And I'm a huge true crime fan, so I get that. I think it's really interesting. People want a window into how this works.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Whoever controls the drug business, controls the street.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best streaming answer to broadcast crime obsession and our pick for best new arrival, the dark, brutal, cold world of The Penguin.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Couldn't get enough of Colin Farrell as Oz. That performance is going to be top of mind for a long time. Give him all the Emmys.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Look out at this wasteland. Looks like chaos.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Maybe there was too much to sort through.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: There is a lot of television, there's a lot of competition.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: The call is coming from inside the house.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Still, for TV with an international flair, "The Diplomat" with Keri Russell was a standout.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It is the series that you must watch, especially if you don't have time, especially if you're a working woman and your kids are making you crazy. UNKNOWN

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: No, you're a cheater.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In comedy, "Curb Your Enthusiasm's" Larry David used his 12th season to say goodbye with sensitivity.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Very sorry to hear about your father.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Father and mother, thank you.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Well, that's, you know, it's a little better. Your dad is still alive?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Oh, well there you go. Boom.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: "Shrinking," book some fun new sessions.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: It's not your mission's job to heal you.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: I think it's Harrison Ford like goal in a best way. I mean, everyone, you know, likes "Indiana Jones." I think it's really cool to see him do something completely different.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You can even be Batman.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And the best creepiest perfect series for our psychopathic times, we've got to give it to "Baby Reindeer."

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Ladies and gentlemen, this is my stalker. Say hello to Mark.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Don't you say that to me. Apologize to me right now.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: I found it difficult to watch at times, but it was truly like a car accident. I couldn't take my eyes off it.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I'm going to be talking about Chuck E. Cheese 4, and I'm not kidding about this, the next 25 minutes.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Political satire in the hands of John Oliver, Bill Maher, and The Daily Show found new life in our politically fractured world.WOOD JR.: CNN got a show on Saturday nights now where they talk about the news and crack jokes. The host of that one is pretty good too. I'm Roy Wood Jr.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Lyle was the only person that had ever protected me.

utterances.speaker: MARTHA STEWART, WRITER
utterances.sentences: I was on the top of the world. BROWN

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: The realm is only hope is an elite strong enough to unite them.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And for sheer adventure "House of the Dragon" left plenty of viewers breathless and wanting more.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: They're getting ready for a big battle and then that's the end of the season? That was it.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Many years ago, the great injustice stole everything from me.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But our pick for series of the Year, draw your swords, it's --

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Kill them.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Had me gripped every single episode. The visuals, the score, the acting, the story. Absolutely, absolutely amazing show.(END VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Of course, the biggest audiences in television were generally not for drama, comedy, or reality, but for sports, including the 30 million viewers tuning in each day to watch the biggest, best competition of the year.Paris said, ooh, la, la, let's play at the Olympics. And the U.S. collected the most medals by far. Katie Ledecky snagged four more as she became the most decorated U.S. female Olympian ever.

utterances.speaker: KATIE LEDECKY, SWIMMER
utterances.sentences: I just love the pool, love the water, love telling people how great our sport is.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The U.S. women's and men's basketball teams dominated for gold in both cases beating the host country's team. Zut alor, that had to be the worst.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: And to see Steph Curry just like chucking bombs at the end, one after another after another, it was great.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: I'm going to remember it for a long, long time. I'm going to tell my grandkids about it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In the 100-meter dash, Noah Lyles took the title of world's fastest man in a photo finish, then medaled again and collapsed.WOOD JR.: That boy won an Olympic medal on COVID. Do you understand when I had COVID, I couldn't walk up the stairs?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The unstoppable Simone Biles jumped, flipped, and fought her way into the medals again.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: She's amazing. Such an inspiration.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And the men weren't bad either.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: The male athlete with the glasses whose name I cannot remember who was so serious, I mean, he blew me away.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the U.S. can't claim the most amazing performance that goes to Australia and the dazzling dance of Rachael Gunn, better known as Raygun.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: I feel badly that so much fun has been made, and yet I might have also been Raygun for Halloween.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Back on U.S. shores, the Kansas City Chiefs bested the San Francisco 49ers to repeat as Super Bowl champs, first time since the Patriots two decades ago.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: I think Patrick Mahomes is on pace to be the GOAT, to unseat Tom Brady as the greatest of all time.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In baseball, the Los Angeles Dodgers crushed the New York Yankees in the World Series, and the best of the best was clearly number 17.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: Ah. Shohei Ohtani. It was thrilling to see this kid who, and I'm going to call him a kid because he's so young. This import from Japan, really killing it in American sports.WOOD JR.: He's still a base. He smile. He hit a home run. He smile. He strike out. He smile. You can't hate that.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In hockey, the Florida Panthers mauled the Edmonton Oilers for Lord Stanley's Cup. Oh, Canada. In basketball, the Boston Celtics grabbed the top trophy by roping and tying the Dallas Mavericks.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It was really fun to see the Celtics winning again.

utterances.speaker: CAITLIN CLARK, BASKETBALL PLAYER
utterances.sentences: These people were my idols. I grew up wanting to be like them.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Also in basketball, Caitlin Clark, the phenom who brought record audiences to college games is now lighting up the WNBA.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: I love watching an athlete who has revolutionized interest in a sport, and I just think about how many little girls she has brought to basketball.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: We'll give it to you, Chet.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worse spectacle, the aging iron Mike Tyson squaring off with internet influencer Jake Paul.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: I don't know what I expected.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: Something about that fight was really hard to watch.

utterances.speaker: TARA DOWER, CANDY MAMA
utterances.sentences: If you don't know who I am, my name is Tara Dower, otherwise known as Candy Mama. FOREMANthe year, Tara Dower ran all 2,189 miles of the Appalachian Trail in a record 40 days, 18 hours and 5 minutes.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Don't you run off, grab some more snacks and sit tight, because when we come back we'll have the best of pop culture, science, the arts, and look, up in the sky.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Wow. It's so cool.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In pop culture, art and science, the best show on earth about things off earth was the total eclipse that sliced across America. The worst reality? All the places you couldn't see it.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: I did see the clip of Brianna and Boris doing Sun and Moon, and that was about as close to the eclipse as I got.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: The moon will be going in front of the sun. We didn't tell our bosses that we were going to do it, because we thought they'd shut us down.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: It was an astounding moment to witness in person, and one that I'll never forget.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The second-best celestial show was that rare explosion of northern lights much farther south than usual.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: It turns out you can see them better through your phone, but if I'm looking at it through my phone, am I really looking at it?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And let's not forget the spectacular comet that lit up the skies in autumn.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: When was the comet?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Unidentified objects in any domain pose potential threats to U.S. safety and security.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The best testimony for those who are sure the truth is out there. Lawmakers held more hearings on UFO or UAP sightings.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: I firmly believe that we are not alone in the universe. I just want a little bit more evidence to prove it to me.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best Bones, an exciting new dinosaur was discovered in Montana, although once again, the worst news, it was not alive.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: I feel like they're just making up dinosaurs now to feature in a new "Jurassic Park" movie.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The world population has grown to about 8 billion people. The U.S. population this year tipped above 337 million, and the most popular baby names are returning champions, Noah and Olivia.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: Can you imagine what that second-grade classroom is going to be like? Olivia, eight hands go up in the air.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Most common languages spoken by American homes after English, Spanish, Chinese, and?

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: German? Are the Germans here?

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: It's not Korean?

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: I honestly, I have no clue.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Tagalog, a language of the Philippines.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: I never would have guessed that, ever.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The fastest growing sport seems to be pickleball with 50 million people picking up paddles this year.WOOD JR.: Which meant they annoyed 100 million people who were close by just trying to play tennis.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Among big changes you may have missed, best mouse in the house, steamboat Willie. The progenitor of Mickey Mouse went into the public domain. The best salute to bees came from Utah, which officially adopted a new state flag with a beehive in the middle. The Boy Scouts of America became Scouting America to promote more inclusion.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: I was a Girl Scout. I think I did something on textiles.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The French Bulldog remains America's favorite dog breed. Top names for all dogs this year, Luna.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: Luna, I love that name actually.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And Milo.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Who's a good boy? Milo.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best frequent flyer or floater. The emperor penguin that somehow drifted all the way from Antarctica to Australia.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Hats off to the penguin. Whatever you're trying to do, glad you did it. FOREMANa wall that sold for more than six million dollars because hey, art.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Is that a banana on the wall or you're just happy to see?WOOD JR.: I'm tell you right now I got an orange taped to a piece of wood with some super glue. I sell it to you for 200,000.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: No matter how you slice it, I don't get it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: That about does it, but before we go, we always ask the friends who have joined us their wishes for the coming year.WOOD JR.: My wish for the coming year is peace and love, especially on inauguration day.

utterances.speaker: LAH
utterances.sentences: I hope in this year going forward that people will just be more kind.

utterances.speaker: SANCHEZ
utterances.sentences: I wish for the Miami Dolphins to finally, finally make it to the Super Bowl in my lifetime.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: It feels like a lot of people have been feeling stretched and they've been feeling anxious. And I just would like to calm that down. That would be my wish.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: My wish for next year is that everyone gets their own podcast or a cabinet appointment, whether they're qualified for it or not.

utterances.speaker: BROWN
utterances.sentences: I just think if we better understood each other, we'd be happier and there'd be more peace.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: We got to figure out a way to coexist much more peacefully. And at the very least, we're heading in the wrong direction from those ideals. So, let's fix that.
